headline: Is Dow’s Recent 3% Rebound a Signal for a Turnaround in 2025?
summary: So you’re looking at Dow’s stock and wondering if it’s finally time to make a move, or sit on the sidelines a little longer. You’re not alone, and there are good reasons why investors keep coming back to this old industrial powerhouse. Over the past year, Dow’s share price has seen some tough times, down over 50.5% in the past twelve months and still off by more than 37% so far this year. However, despite a rough backdrop, the past month did bring a promising 3% bump, which shows that some...
